creator: gmaloon@metro.co.za
text:
The 2 methods return 127.0.0.1 and localhost respectively regardless of the 
client location.

This occurs on win2k as well.

This bug exists in 4.0 and 4.0.1 as well.

Fixed in the nightly.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 4564 ***
